attributes.action: secure the pardon and immediate release of Gillian Gibbons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gillian Gibbons a British teacher has been arrested in the Sudan, accused of insulting the Prophet of Islam, simply for allowing her class to name a Teddy Bear Muhammed. Gillian Gibbons faces receiving 40 lashes and a possible 6 months jail term. 

We the undersigned do demand that the Prime Minister takes immediate action to secure the commuting of her sentence and her immediate release.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
